dialogueTree.title: Inland Empire: "Rust peels off the bent iron posts..."
dialogueTree.text: Rust peels off the bent iron posts of the swing. The wind whistles through the skeleton of the small house behind you. There's desolation... everywhere.

links.title: Empathy: "Yet someone used to live here. Laug..."
links.text: Yet someone used to live here. Laugh here. Thought it was a good idea to build a *swing* even...

links.title: You: ""What happened here?""
links.text: "What happened here?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""In this yard?" The lieutenant look..."
links.text: "In this yard?" The lieutenant looks at the small building. A flock of grey swallows takes off in the distance.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "He's assessing the situation. How l..."
links.text: He's assessing the situation. How long ago was it abandoned.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Someone thought they could have a..."
links.text: "Someone thought they could have a summer house in a *bloc obscur*. For cheap. It didn't work out. They abandoned it about a decade ago."

links.title: You: ""Wait, what's a *bloc obscur?*""
links.text: "Wait, what's a *bloc obscur?*"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A black bloc, a part of the city l..."
links.text: "A black bloc, a part of the city left unrenovated after the war. Or one that has fallen to gang violence. Or has become inhospitable in some other way."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "On aerial photos, bloc obscures loo..."
links.text: On aerial photos, bloc obscures look like dark squares. Hence their name.

links.title: You: ""So this part of the coast is a *bl..."
links.text: "So this part of the coast is a *bloc obscur*?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Practically. It's not an official..."
links.text: "Practically. It's not an official term in any way, but..." he spreads his arms, "look around -- no sewage, broken power lines, crime, drunks... Life is tough in the blocs. It's no place to build a summer house."

links.title: You: ""At least they left some old music..."
links.text: "At least they left some old music behind." (Tap on the tape you picked up)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes -- and you picked it up as par..."
links.text: "Yes -- and you picked it up as part of the Jamrock shuffle." He gives you a weary smile.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "It's not meant as nagging, just an..."
links.text: It's not meant as nagging, just an observation.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should move. I don't think our..."
links.text: "We should move. I don't think our suspect is in this particular yard. No place to hide, and besides, it's too close to Martinaise."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should move. I don't think we w..."
links.text: "We should move. I don't think we will solve the murder with forays into the urban hinterland. At least in this phase of the investigation."

links.title: You: ""Maybe they left something useful b..."
links.text: "Maybe they left something useful behind?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes -- for you to pick up as part..."
links.text: "Yes -- for you to pick up as part of the Jamrock shuffle." He gives you a weary smile.

links.title: You: ""You're right -- it's no place. Let..."
links.text: "You're right -- it's no place. Let's go." [Finish]

links.title: You: "What happened here?"
links.text: What happened here?

links.title: Inland Empire: "In this yard? Someone thought they..."
links.text: In this yard? Someone thought they could have a summer house on the beach. For cheap. It didn't work out. Looks like they abandoned it.

links.title: Empathy: "A long time ago, someone used to li..."
links.text: A long time ago, someone used to live here. Laugh here. Thought it was a good idea to build a *swing* even... an intense loneliness comes over you.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "This is a good place for a nice *sa..."
links.text: This is a good place for a nice *sad* drink. Uncork a velvety bottle of red wine and think about life for a moment. Really *philosophise*.

links.title: You: "[Discard thought.]"
links.text: [Discard thought.]
